platform.name: Poultry Produce Platform
platform.description: Poultry Produce Platform aims to support poultry farmers in adopting eco-friendly practices and improving their operations. The website will feature functionalities to add poultry produce, update the poultry produce, view all the farm produce, and delete any unwanted farm produce.

challenges: Biosecurity risks from diseases like avian influenza.
Fluctuations in feed quality and prices.
Environmental concerns related to waste management.
Poor housing conditions leading to stress and health issues in birds.
Animal welfare concerns impacting consumer perceptions.
Navigating regulatory compliance, pest control, and processing challenges.
Adapting to changing consumer preferences for organic or antibiotic-free options.

solutions.statement: Develop an online platform dedicated to adding, updating, viewing all the farm produce, and deleting any unwanted farm produce.

userStories.story: As a user, I want to add poultry produce.
As a user, I want to update the poultry produce.
As a user, I want to view all the farm produce.
As a user, I want to view individual farm produce.
As a user, I want to delete any unwanted farm produce.

futurePlans: Develop a mobile app to enhance accessibility and engagement for farmers on the go.
Host live sessions with experts on topics like organic feed and poultry health management.
Partner with universities and agricultural organizations to provide up-to-date research and resources.
Integrate tools for farmers to track their poultry farming metrics and improve operational efficiency.
Increase the variety of products and services offered, including poultry equipment and health services.
